channel.title: Matrix comile help
channel.description: I'm wondering if i can make it so I don't have to restart my server after i compile it, is it possible? So like i compile and the changes happen automatically without me having to restart the server in matrix

item.title: Matrix comile help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Is it possible? Yes, but not without heavily editing how the server works.

If the server is dynamically loading content, then you could just reload the content. However, if you’re changing any core enging mechanics (networking, content loading, etc) you’re going to have to restart the server.

Read full topic
